articles.author: Andrew Freiden
articles.title: How to see the Oct. 14 Annular Solar Eclipse - WWBT
articles.description: On Saturday, October 14th, a partial eclipse will appear in the sky over Virginia, and most of North America! In Richmond, if you aren’t paying attention, you might not even notice around 35% of the sun’s visible disk will be blocked by the sun.
articles.content:
RICHMOND, Va. (WWBT) - A partial eclipse will appear in the sky over Virginia, and most of North America on Saturday, Oct. 14.
